title: kAdalAgi vandOm
sahitya:
kAdalAgi vandOm kaNNA un kaTTzhagaik-kaNDOm


anupallavi

  nAdak-kuzhal Udum vEda OmkArattil nAn enbadai marandu nI enbadai ninaindu


caraNam    anbat-tEnArODum amara Utrin amudE amaidi tarum oLiyE inbamayamAna
idaya guhaikkanalE EkAntamE anEkAntamE bhOgAntamE yOgAntamE
